doc.title: Luchadores en el Pantano de los Muertos
doc.plot: Welcome to the "Swamp of the Dead" where the forces of light and darkness collide with the world of Lucha Libre. "Luchadores en el Pantano de los Muertos" tells a tale of the lust for power, the supernatural clash of good and evil and the courage of ordinary people in the face of death or worse.
